name: The Guy and his Time Machine!
name_original: The Guy and his Time Machine!
description:
Story: You are "Doctor Poo", the guy. And you have messed up! you have been sent back in time and need to get back to the present! In each level, you need to find the R-E-T-A-R-D-I-S!

Right now there is only 5 levels and is in alpha
